import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Form, Button, FloatingLabel, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useAuth } from '../../../../../AuthContext' import results from '../../../../../results' const EditForm = () => { const { currentUser, userDetails } = useAuth() const [contactPerson, setContactPerson] = useState(userDetails.userName) const [companyName, setCompanyName] = useState(userDetails.companyName) const [email, setEmail] = useState(userDetails.email) console.log(userDetails, currentUser.uid) function handleSubmit() { } return (
Change Profile Picture
setContactPerson(e.target.value)} /> setCompanyName(e.target.value)} /> setEmail(e.target.value)} />
) } export default EditForm
